Ejemplo elaborado `r date()`.

```{r GenerarHistograma}
  set.seed(20140812)
  x <- rnorm(10000, mean=80, sd=10)
  hist(x, breaks = 100, border = "white", col = gray(0.7))
  abline(v = mean(x), col = "blue", lwd = 2)
```

```{r GenerarHistogramaYBoxPlot}
par(mfrow=c(2,1))
hist(x,breaks=100,border="white",col=gray(0.7))
abline(v=mean(x),col="blue",lwd=2)

boxplot(x, horizontal = TRUE, col = gray(0.5))
```
